name: assignment-1
description:
1. Spin up a Node.js-driven Server (on port 3000) 2. Handle two Routes: "/" and users "/users" a. Return some greeting text on "/" b. Return a list of dummy users (e.g.) ```html
  • User 1
  • User 2
``` 3. Add a form with a "username" to the "/" page and submit a POST request to the "/create-user" upon a button click 4. Add the "/create-user" route and parse the incoming data (i.e. the username) and simply log it to the console.
